resources.string: Default implementation Textview and Button, direct use TextView2 or Button2 that will do， other controls need to be implemented LangChangableView interface， Internal Method for Copying TextView2 you can do that .it must be used before in Application initialization with CLang.init(this); It can also be used in designated language environments. CLang.init(this, Locale.CHINA);when initialization requires language modification CLang.swithLang(context);that will do， Language environment will be used SharedPreferences store it locally
